name: Science of a Small world
description:
#LD38

Ludum Dare 38 Entry

What's this? Planets acting funny you say? Well it's bot #2071-7743a to the rescue!!! Save the planet! (or at least try to. You won't succeed.)

Patch holes in the planet and survive as long as you can in this 2.6D planet simulator!

Warning:

1: This game may have MANY bugs in it. I only had 12 hours to work on it :/

2: Playing this on mac is unstable! Don't get mad if it doesn't work for you on your mac!
